items.sentence: The rich really are different from you and me.
I don't envy your life, not even a little bit.
We're better off than we were three years ago.
We were powerless to do anything to stop that.
There were some children swimming in the pool.
I want to invite Tom and Mary over for dinner.
I've been learning French since I was a child.
Tom says that studying French is a lot of fun.
I have to get back home and study for an exam.
Giraffes can reach leaves other animals can't.
